org.agreement_technologies.service.map_landmarks

Class RPG

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_landmarks.RPG

  • public class RPG
extends java.lang.Object
    RPG class represents the disRPG (distributed relaxed planning graph) of the planning agent.
    Since:
    1.0

        Parameters:
